segments.text: Yes , please . Can I exchange money here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here we can exchange HAD , USD and Euros . Which do you require ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To be honest , I really wanted to exchange my GAP , but I suppose USD will be fine . I have some and I just need a little local currency for expenses . Could you tell me what the rate is like today ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: At the moment it's 830.43 RIB for 100 USD , which is a pretty good rate .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , that sounds fine . I think 200 USD worth of RIB should be plenty , thanks .
segments.speaker: S2
